    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ventriloquist's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3114)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 296 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant copper ring has miniature images of songbirds engraved around its circumference. You gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks. 

**Activate—Throw Voice** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** Twisting the ring around your finger allows you to magically throw your voice, with the effects of a [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) spell (DC 19).

</column>

**Price** 670 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ring grants a +2 bonus. When you activate the ring, you gain the effects of 2nd-rank [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (DC 27). You can activate the ring any number of times per day.
